name: 餐旅營收與利潤管理
description:
1. To develop students the managerial decision based on revenue and profit through textbook guidance, paper review, case study and project presentation.
2. To introduce the state-of-art managerial accounting technique, such as menu engineering, balanced scorecard, activity-based costing & management & budgeting and application on hospitality to students.
3. To help students immediately apply what they’ve learned to the types of key management decisions made in the hospitality industry.
goals: To develop students the managerial decision based on revenue and profit through textbook guidance, paper review, case study and project presentation.

To introduce the state-of-art managerial accounting technique, such as menu engineering, balanced scorecard, activity-based costing & management & budgeting and application on hospitality to students.
To help students immediately apply what they’ve learned to the types of key management decisions made in the hospitality industry.
syllabus:
**教學進度與主題**

1.  W Hotel 的四項管理挑戰-四位以上W Taipei 高階主管親自擔任小組導師
2.  享受在國際品牌 萬豪集團 W Taipei 的成果報告與饗宴
3.  與泰國知名大學Dhurakij Pundit University 遠距共同上課
4.  商業模式九宮格的餐旅應用實戰
5.  一日經營創意餐飲店-體驗當老闆的酸甜苦辣
6.  八小時學會手機APP 開發與執行工作坊-科技帶來餐飲業的創新
7.  八小時學會大數據科技的爬蟲語言 Python -爬蟲程式語言撰寫工作坊
8.  課程配合計畫，調整上課時間，詳見第一堂課之課程時間表
9.  全部課程將於12月中期末報告

methodologies.note: 採用論文常用方法引導教學，藉講授課本，模擬軟體與期刊論文搭配，引起同學研究動機。
採用 case study 競賽引導同學討論
case study & Paper 引導學生學習興趣
藉由實際參訪餐旅產業達到與實務結合之目的
善用 Case Study 引導同學學習專案經理與專案組織
